seo.title: Lexikongo — Kikongo Dictionary · French · English
seo.description: Lexikongo is an online Kikongo dictionary · French · English with phonetics. Explore Kikongo words, verbs, and expressions, and help preserve the language.
seo.ogDescription: A modern resource to discover, practice, and pass on the Kikongo language: words, verbs, expressions, and phonetics.

addVerb.title: Submit a verb in Kikongo
addVerb.subtitle: Submit a verb in Kikongo with his radical verbal, his phonetics and his translations.

meta.label: Contributor · Entry of verb
meta.title: Contributor · Submit a verb in Kikongo – Lexikongo
meta.description: Soumettez a new verb in Kikongo for revue by the team Lexikongo.

addVerb.helpRequired: The champs marqués of a astérisque (*) are obligatoires. Thank you of donner to the less a translation.
addVerb.reviewNotice: Your proposition will be examinée by the team Lexikongo before a possible publication in the dictionary.

fields.derivedVerb: This verb is derived of a autre verb
fields.derivedFrom: ID of the verb of database

hints.infinitive: Écrivez the infinitive without « ku » (ex. longa, bala…).
hints.root: Indiquez the radical verbal (ex. long-, bal-…).
hints.phonetic: You can utiliser of crochets and of accents for préciser the pronunciation.
hints.translationFr: You can submit plusieurs meanings in French, separated by of virgules.
hints.translationEn: You can submit plusieurs meanings in English, separated by of virgules.
hints.derivedVerb: Cochez si this verb is construit to partir of a autre (derived morphologique).
hints.derivedFrom: ID interne of the verb of database, si you the connaissez (sinon, laissez vide).
hints.derivedVerbType: Sélectionnez the type of derivation (passive, causative, etc.), si you the connaissez.

addVerb.success: Thank you ! Your verb to been submitted and will be verified by a administrator.

errors.missingCore: Thank you of remplir to the less the infinitive and the radical verbal.
errors.missingUser: You must be logged in for submit a verb.
errors.missingTranslations: Thank you of submit to the less a translation (FR or In).
errors.generic: Error while the envoi of your proposition of verb.

errors.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in for pouvoir submit a contenu.

addWord.title: Submit a word in Kikongo
addWord.subtitle: Submit a word in Kikongo with his class noun class, his phonetics and his translations.

meta.label: Contributor · Entry of word
meta.title: Contributor · Submit a word in Kikongo – Lexikongo
meta.description: Formulaire contributor for submit a new word in Kikongo with class noun class, phonetics and translations françaises and anglaises.

addWord.helpRequired: The champs marqués of a astérisque (*) are obligatoires. Thank you of donner to the less a translation.
addWord.reviewNotice: Your proposition will be examinée by the team Lexikongo before a possible publication in the dictionary.

placeholders.translationFr: Meanings FR separated by of virgules…

hints.singular: The word to the singulier, tel qu'il is utilisé in Kikongo (forme of database).
hints.plural: Indiquez the plural si you the connaissez. Sinon, you can laisser this champ vide.
hints.numberVariability: Optionnel : précisez si the word ne s'emploie qu'to the singulier, to the plural, or s'il is invariable.
hints.translationFr: You can submit plusieurs meanings in French, separated by of virgules or on plusieurs lignes.
hints.translationEn: You can submit plusieurs meanings in English, separated by of virgules or on plusieurs lignes.
hints.phonetic: You can utiliser the crochets and the accents for préciser the pronunciation.
hints.derivedWord: Check this box if the word is built from another word or from a verb (action noun, result noun, person, etc.).
hints.numberVariabilityShort: Variable : Singulier/Plural différents (Mukento/Bankento). Invariable : words qui ne changent pas (adverbes, conjonctions, etc.).
hints.derivedFromVerb: Search the verb of database in the dictionary (infinitive in « ku… » or translation).
hints.baseWordSearch: Tapez quelques lettres of the word (Kikongo, French or English) puis choose the bon result.
hints.baseVerbSearch: Tapez quelques lettres of the verb (Kikongo, French or English) puis choose the bon result.

errors.requiredSingular: Thank you of remplir to the less the singulier of the word in Kikongo.
errors.requiredClassId: Thank you of enter the class noun class (to the minimum a estimation).
errors.translationRequired: Thank you of submit to the less a translation (FR or In).
errors.generic: Error while the envoi of your proposition of word. Thank you of try again more tard.

addWord.success: Thank you ! Your word to been submitted and will be verified by a administrator before publication possible.

fields.derivedWord: This word is derived of a autre word or of a verb
fields.derivedFromWord: Word of database in the dictionary

addWord.baseWordNoResults: No word ne correspond to this searched for the instant.

page.title: Privacy policy
page.subtitle: Comment Lexikongo collecte, utilise and protège your data personnelles.
page.metaHighlight: Lexikongo is hébergé in Europe and respecte the RGPD.

meta.title: Privacy policy | Lexikongo
meta.description: Discover comment Lexikongo collecte, utilise and protège your data personnelles lors of the utilisation of the dictionary Kikongo – French / English & phonetics.

intro.title: Protection of your data on Lexikongo
intro.lead: This privacy policy clearly and transparently explains how the lexikongo.fr website collects, uses, and protects your personal data, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable French law.

responsible.title: Responsable of the traitement
responsible.body:
The controller responsible for processing the data collected via the site is Artful Batina Creative Studios (Cédric Batina), located in Gradignan (France). This processing is carried out as part of preserving and promoting the Kikongo language.

If you have any questions about your personal data or this policy, you can write to: contact (at) lexikongo.fr.

hosting.title: Hébergement of the site
hosting.body:
The'hébergement of the site and of bases of data Lexikongo is assuré by Infomaniak Network His, prestataire database in Suisse, in of centres of data situés on the territoire suisse. The Suisse bénéficie of a décision of adéquation of the Commission European, this qui signifie qu'elle offre a niveau of protection of data personnelles considéré comme équivalent to celui of the Union European.

Infomaniak fournit the infrastructure matérielle, the sauvegardes and a partie of journaux techniques required to the bon fonctionnement and to the security of the service.

legalBasis.title: Bases légales and finalités of the traitement
legalBasis.body:
Lexikongo traite your data personnelles for plusieurs finalités :

• Fournir the service of dictionary online (consultation, searched, affichage of words, verbs and expressions).
• Manage the creation, the authentification and the suivi of accounts users (Log in, security, roles, historique minimal).
• Permettre the contribution to the lexicon (submission, validation, moderation and publication of contenus submitted by the community).
• Assurer the security of the site, prévenir the usages frauduleux, lutter contre the abus and improve the stabilité technique.
• Répondre to your demandes envoyées via the formulaires of contact or of assistance.

The principales bases légales to the meanings of the RGPD are :
• The'exécution of the contrat (fourniture of the service lorsque you create a account and utilisez Lexikongo in as qu'user inscrit).
• The'intérêt légitime of Lexikongo (sécurisation of the plateforme, amélioration continue, lutte contre the fraude and the abus).
• The consentement, lorsque celui-ci is required for certaines features optionnelles (by exemple, a possible newsletter or certains cookies non essentiels si nous in ajoutons to the avenir).

items.account: Account data: nickname / username, email address, ... language settings, account creation and update dates.
items.usage: Data of usage : pages consultées, recherches effectuées in the dictionary, préférences of affichage, as well as certaines informations techniques fournies by your navigateur (type of navigateur, système of exploitation, horodatages). Of journaux techniques (logs) can contenir your adresse IP tronquée or pseudonymisée.
items.contributions: Data of contribution : words, verbs, expressions and autres contenus that you submit, as well as their métadonnées (date of submission, status of moderation, historique of validations or rejets).
items.technical: Technical data and cookies: authentication tokens (JWT) ... (login attempts, IP address blocking in case of abuse).

retention.title: Durée of conservation of data
retention.body:
Lexikongo applique of durées of conservation proportionnées to the finalités poursuivies :

• Account user : your data of account are conservées as that your account is actif. In cas of inactivité prolongée or of demande of deletion, certaines informations can be archivées pendant a durée limitée (by exemple jusqu'has 3 ans) for of raisons légales or of preuve.
• Contributions (words, verbs, expressions) : the contenus publiés can be conservés of manière durable afin of préserver the cohérence of the dictionary. In cas of retrait, the data can be pseudonymisées or anonymisées lorsque cela is possible.
• Journaux techniques and security : the journaux of Log in and of security are conservés pendant a durée limitée (généralement quelques mois) afin of détecter the incidents, prévenir the abus and improve the stabilité of the service.
• Cookies and jetons : the jeton of access (JWT) to a durée of vie courte (environ 15 minutes), tandis that the jeton of rafraîchissement can be valable jusqu'has 14 jours. To the-delà, a new authentification you will be demandée.

recipients.title: Destinataires and sous-traitants
recipients.body:
Access to your personal data is limited to the people and organizations that need it to carry out their duties:

• The publisher and maintainer of Lexikongo (Artful Batina Creative Studios / Cédric Batina), for development, maintenance, security, and editorial administration of the platform.
• The host Infomaniak Network SA, for providing the technical infrastructure, backups, and access logs.
• Where applicable, specialized service providers (for example: payment providers for financial contributions, or email delivery tools), subject to confidentiality and security obligations.

Lexikongo does not sell or rent your personal data. Data is shared with third parties only for the purposes described in this policy or to comply with legal obligations (requests from a competent authority, court decisions, etc.).

transfers.title: Transferts of data hors Union European
transfers.body:
The data liées to Lexikongo are mainly hébergées in Suisse, auprès of Infomaniak Network His. The Suisse bénéficie of a décision of adéquation of the Commission European, this qui signifie qu'elle offre a niveau of protection of data personnelles équivalent to celui of the Union European.

Si certains prestataires techniques (by exemple, services of paiement or of e-mailing) are situés in dehors of the Union European or of pays reconnus comme adéquats, Lexikongo veille to this that of garanties appropriées soient mises in place (clauses contractuelles types, encadrement contractuel renforcé, mesures techniques additional) afin of protéger your data.

security.title: Mesures of security
security.body:
Lexikongo met in œuvre of mesures techniques and organisationnelles raisonnables for protéger your data contre the perte, the access non autorisé, the divulgation or the destruction :

• Communication chiffrée entre your navigateur and the site (HTTPS / TLS).
• Stockage of words of passe sous forme hachée and non in clair.
• Management of roles (user, contributor, administrator) for limiter the access to the data sensibles.
• Journalisation of événements techniques importants (erreurs, connexions, actions sensibles) for détecter the anomalies.
• Mises up to date régulières of composants techniques utilisés by the plateforme.

No mesure n'offrant a security absolue, nous you recommandons également of utiliser a word of passe robuste and of ne pas the réutiliser on of autres sites.

cookies.title: Cookies, JWT and autres traceurs
cookies.body:
Lexikongo mainly uses cookies and tokens (JWT)... required for the site to function and for account security:

• Authentication cookies: when you log in, a token... 15 minutes, used to verify that you are properly logged in.
• Refresh cookie: a refresh token, also... 30 days, to avoid having to re-enter your credentials too frequently.
• Preference cookies: some cookies can remember your... display settings) to improve your comfort of use.

No advertising cookies are used. If analytics tools are added... a banner would allow you, where applicable, to accept or refuse them.

rights.title: Your droits on your data (RGPD)
rights.body:
Conformément to the RGPD and to the loi Informatique and Libertés, you disposez notamment of droits suivants :

• Droit of access : obtenir the confirmation qu'a traitement of data you concernant is effectué and in recevoir a copied.
• Droit of rectification : demander the correction of data inexactes or incomplètes (by exemple, your pseudonyme or your adresse e-mail).
• Droit to the effacement : demander the deletion of certaines data you concernant, in the limites prévues by the loi (by exemple, deletion of your account).
• Droit of opposition : you opposer, for of motifs légitimes, to certains traitements fondés on the intérêt légitime.
• Droit to the limitation of the traitement : demander the suspension temporaire of certains traitements lorsque you contestez the exactitude of data or the licéité of the traitement.
• Droit to the portabilité : recevoir, lorsque cela is applicable, the data that you avez fournies in a format structuré, couramment utilisé and lisible by machine.

Certaines contributions publiques (words, verbs, expressions) can be conservées sous a forme pseudonymisée or anonymisée afin of préserver the cohérence éditoriale of the dictionary tout in respectant your droits.

contact.title: Exercer your droits or poser a question
contact.body:
For toute question relative to your data personnelles, or for exercer your droits (access, rectification, deletion, opposition, etc.), you can nous contacter to the adresse suivante : contact (at) lexikongo.fr.

Afin of faciliter the traitement of your demande, nous you invitons to préciser the éléments suivants :
• The'adresse e-mail utilisée on Lexikongo.
• The or the droits that you souhaitez exercer.

Nous pouvons be amenés to you demander of informations additional for verify your identité. A réponse you will be apportée in a délai indicatif of a mois. Si you estimez, after nous avoir contactés, that your droits ne are pas respectés, you can déposer a réclamation auprès of the autorité of contrôle compétente : the CNIL (cnil.fr) in France.

law.title: Loi applicable and juridiction compétente
law.body: This privacy policy is governed by French law and the GDPR. In the event of a persistent issue related to the protection of your personal data, after contacting Lexikongo and, where applicable, the CNIL, the French courts will have exclusive jurisdiction. As an indication, the court with material and territorial jurisdiction is that of Bordeaux, given the controller’s establishment in Gradignan (France).

update.title: Mises up to date of this politique
update.body:
This privacy policy may evolve to reflect the development of the Lexikongo service, changes in regulations, or the introduction of new features (for example, new contribution modes or new partnerships).

We invite you to review it regularly. In case of a significant change, a visible notice may be displayed on the site. Last updated: 8 December 2025.

page.title: Frequently asked questions
page.subtitle: Get a quick overview of how Lexikongo works: accounts, roles, contributions, moderation, and privacy.
page.meta: Lexikongo is a dictionary collaboratif dedicated to the Kikongo : voici comment the utiliser sereinement.
page.primaryCta: Search a word or a verb

meta.title: Lexikongo FAQ – Frequently Asked Questions
meta.description: Everything you need to know about Lexikongo: accounts, roles, contributions, word and verb validation, privacy, and upcoming improvements.

general.title: Général
general.description: The bases for comprendre this qu'is Lexikongo and to quoi sert the plateforme.

whatIsLexikongo.a: Lexikongo is a collaborative dictionary dedicated to the Kikongo language... with translations in French and English, and simplified phonetics to make learning easier.

whichLanguages.q: Quelles langues are prises in loaded ?
whichLanguages.a: Aujourd'hui, Lexikongo se concentre on the Kikongo with of translations vers the French and the English. Of'autres langues pourront be ajoutées progressivement.

whoIsItFor.a: Lexikongo is for learners, native speakers, teachers... researchers, and anyone curious to discover the Kikongo language.

isItFree.a: The consultation of the lexicon and the creation of a account user are currently gratuites. You can soutenir the projet via the contributions and dons si you the souhaitez.

accounts.title: Accounts & roles
accounts.description: Comprendre the différence entre user, contributor and administrator.

roles.q: Quels are the roles disponibles on Lexikongo ?

a.user: • User : can view the words, verbs and fiches publiques.
a.contributor: • Contributor : can submit of new words and verbs qui seront validés by a administrator.
a.admin: • Administrator : gère the submissions, valide or rejette the contenus and supervise the plateforme.

needAccount.q: Ai-je besoin of a account for utiliser Lexikongo ?
needAccount.a: You can view the dictionary without account. In revanche, a account is required for submit of new words, verbs or suivre your submissions.

becomeContributor.a: Create a account, puis signalez your intérêt for contribute. Selon the besoins of the projet, a administrator pourra you attribuer the role of contributor.

emailVerification.q: Pourquoi dois-je verify my adresse e-mail ?
emailVerification.a: The verification of e-mail permet of sécuriser your account and of limiter the abus. Elle is utilisée uniquement for the authentification and the security.

contributions.title: Contributions : words & verbs
contributions.description: Tout this qu'il faut savoir for submit of words and of verbs in Kikongo.

a.words: • Of words (noms) : with their forme singulière, plurielle, class noun class, phonetics and translations.
a.verbs: • Of verbs : with the infinitive, the radical verbal, the suffixe, the phonetics and the translations.

wordDetails.q: Quelles informations are required for a word ?
wordDetails.a: Idealement : the singulier, the plural, the class noun class, the phonetics and to the less a translation in French or in English.

verbDetails.q: Quelles informations are required for a verb ?
verbDetails.a: The'infinitive, the radical verbal, the suffixe éventuel, the phonetics and to the less a translation in French or in English.

differenceAdminContributor.q: Quelle is the différence entre a entry admin and a contribution ?
differenceAdminContributor.a: The administrators can add of words and verbs directement in the dictionary. The contributeurs, eux, envoient of submissions qui passent by a étape of validation before of be publiées.

moderation.title: Moderation & validation
moderation.description: Comment are traitées the submissions envoyées by the contributeurs.

statuses.q: That signifient the statuts « in attente », « approved », « rejected » ?

a.pending: • In attente : the submission to been reçue and must encore be examinée by a administrator.
a.approved: • Approved : the word or the verb to been validé and ajouté to the dictionary public.
a.rejected: • Rejected : the submission n'has pas been retenue (souvent with a raison for you aider to the improve).

howLong.q: Combien of temps prend the validation of a word or of a verb ?
howLong.a: The délai dépend of the activity of administrators and of the volume of submissions. The'objectif is of traiter the contributions in of délais raisonnables, without sacrifier the qualité linguistique.

editSubmission.q: Puis-je edit a submission after the avoir envoyée ?
editSubmission.a: As qu'a submission is in attente, il is possible of the corriger or of the compléter via the interface contributor. Si elle is rejected, you can généralement in submit a new version améliorée.

archiving.q: That deviennent the submissions after validation or rejet ?
archiving.a: The submissions approuvées or rejected are archivées pendant a période limitée afin of garder a historique of moderation, puis nettoyées for alléger the database of data.

privacy.title: Privacy & security
privacy.description: Your data personnelles and the security of accounts.

whatData.a: Lexikongo stores the information required for the service to work... plus a few metadata items such as account creation and login dates.

passwords.q: Comment my words of passe are-ils protégés ?
passwords.a: The words of passe are chiffrés côté serveur to the aide of bonnes pratiques of security before of be enregistrés in database of data. Ils ne are jamais stored in clair.

cookies.q: Comment fonctionne the Log in (cookies, jetons, etc.) ?
cookies.a: The session utilise a jeton secure (JWT) stored in a cookie HttpOnly afin of limiter the risques of attaque côté navigateur.

privacyPage.q: Where can I read the full privacy policy?
privacyPage.a: You can find all the information on the dedicated page: Privacy policy / Privacy & data.

future.title: Évolutions of the projet
future.description: This qui is prévu for the prochaines versions of Lexikongo.

newLanguages.a: Oui, the structure of Lexikongo permet of add of autres langues of translation to the avenir afin of toucher a public encore more large.

notifications.q: Y aura-t-il of notifications for the contributeurs ?
notifications.a: A système of notifications (by exemple for signaler qu'a submission is approved or rejected) fait partie of pistes of amélioration prévues.

statsAndTools.q: Of'autres outils are-ils prévus (statistiques, cours, etc.) ?
statsAndTools.a: Oui, the objectif is of enrich Lexikongo with of outils pédagogiques, of statistiques of contribution and, to terme, of features additional for the apprentissage of the Kikongo.

cta.title: Envie of participer to the aventure Lexikongo ?
cta.subtitle: Create a account, devenez contributor and help-nous to enrich the dictionary Kikongo for the générations futures.

page.title: Contactez the team Lexikongo
page.subtitle: A question, a suggestion or a idée of partenariat ? Envoyez-nous a message, nous lisons each demande with attention.

form.title: Envoyez-nous a message
form.subtitle: Remplissez this formulaire, nous reviendrons vers you by e-mail of that possible.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Expliquez-nous your question, your suggestion or your projet…

form.success: Thank you, your message to bien been envoyé. Nous you répondrons by e-mail.

errors.required: Thank you of remplir all the champs obligatoires.
errors.generic: A error is survenue lors of the envoi of the message. Please try again a peu more tard.

why.title: Pourquoi nous contacter ?
why.p1: Lexikongo is a collaborative platform dedicated to preserving and passing on the Kikongo language. Your messages, questions, and suggestions help us improve the dictionary every day.
why.p2: You can also write to us for any partnership request, educational project, technical integration, or support around the Kikongo language.
why.caption: Lexikongo – a pont living entre the Kikongo, the French and the English.

page.title: Contribute to Lexikongo
page.subtitle: Your contributions nous aident to maintenir, enrich and faire rayonner the dictionary Kikongo.
page.meta: Choose the moyen of soutien qui you convient : carte bancaire, PayPal, virement or Mobile Money.
